goal: Create a new wishlist called June trip, with 3-4 places which are by the sea, river or ocean

evals.description: Wishlist name is 'June Trip' (case insensitive, allow 'June trip' and similar)
evals.query: wishlist.wishlists[0].name == 'June Trip' || wishlist.wishlists[0].name == 'June trip' || wishlist.wishlists[0].name == 'june trip' || wishlist.wishlists[0].name == 'JUNE TRIP'

evals.description: Wishlist statistics show it was created
